# Zeedhi Framework - Backend

This is the main repository of Zeedhi Framework's Backend.

The current build status is: [![Build Status](http://192.168.122.57/buildStatus/icon?job=frameworkBackend)](http://192.168.122.57/view/Zeedhi/job/frameworkBackend/).

The API documentation can be found [here](http://192.168.122.54/zeedhi_remote_test/framework/doc/).

The code coverage results can be found [here](http://192.168.122.54/zeedhi_remote_test/framework/codeCoverageReport/).

### Notes

* Mongo Classes work only with deprecated extension. If you want run over PHP 7.0 will need to rewrite these services.
